topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539aa16d63687242f7bf0300#post_539aa16d63687242f7bf0300
Same happened to me going to my sister's wedding a little less than a month ago. Waiting in Denver airport for about 5 hours, fly to Baltimore (wedding was in Andover,  New Jersey) and had to drive.
Also got bad news while in said airport so that was why I was mopey around that time, although few people saw it.

It sucks but the internet makes it better. It fixes every thing.



On another note, it turns out I do have a personality flaw. I tend to allow my interests to consume my personality. Like Fallout and oujos.

topics.body:
Also in the news:
Republicans may have a big problem on their hand.

The short version is what happened to Cantor may happen to a lot of other republicans as well cause in general voters unfavorability towards republican incumbents is way higher than democrats.  The reason why this is bad is that a lot of districts are going to lose their incumbency advantage.

To make it short:
There may actually be a huge upset voting wise where a lot of republicans get voted out and thus the republican party loses their incumbency advantage thus resulting in them actually losing seats.

And today's moral is:
"Party disunity screws you in the general election"
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"It's probably been twelve years since my father left, left me fatherless
And I just used to say I hate him in dishonest jest
When honestly I miss this nigga, like when I was six
And every time I got the chance to say it I would swallow it
Sixteen, I'm hollow, intolerant, skip shots
I storm that whole bottle, I'll show you a role model"

this guy is awesome.
